LanguageData.VV_BroccoliPlant.description: A food crop that produces compact green florets. Its longer growing time makes it better suited for stable, planned farming.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Broccoli plants will continue to grow at 10% speed through winter. They need to be planted during growing season, though.
LanguageData.VV_LeekPlant.description: A hardy vegetable with long white stalks and green tops. Leeks mature quickly and provide a steady, modest harvest, making them a reliable addition to any farm.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Leeks will continue to grow at 10% speed through winter. They need to be planted during growing season, though.
LanguageData.VV_ParsnipPlant.description: A slow-growing root vegetable with creamy edible roots. Parsnips take time to mature but offer steady harvests for the colony.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Parsnips will continue to grow at 10% speed through winter. They need to be planted during growing season, though.
LanguageData.VV_RedCabbagePlant.description: A hardy vegetable producing compact, purple heads. Red cabbage grows steadily and yields a reliable harvest, making it a solid choice for any farm.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Red cabbages will continue to grow at 10% speed through winter. They need to be planted during growing season, though.
LanguageData.VV_SpinachPlant.description: A quick-growing leafy vegetable. Spinach matures quickly and provides a reliable, modest harvest, making it an easy addition to any farm.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Spinach will continue to grow at 10% speed through winter. It needs to be planted during growing season, though.
LanguageData.VV_WhiteTurnipPlant.description: A slow-growing root vegetable with white edible roots. White turnips require patience but offer dependable harvests for the colony.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> White turnips will continue to grow at 10% speed through winter. They need to be planted during growing season, though.
